column4: Hmm... it seems I can ssh and http into the machine but I can't seem to get out other than ping.  Anyone know what might be wrong?
your problem is just that you can't get out fro ma machine aside from ping?
that seems to be the issue
default settings? ie, no manually setup firewall?
there was no firewall that was set up that I know of.
can you ssh to other machines on the same lane?
but you can ping other machines on the lan, and on the interweb?
what did you change since it last worked?
do you have any other ideas or at least point me in a direction?  I'm out of ideas, (other than reinstall.)
if someone else had root, it could be anything
I figure it might be bind with what I've read... but I don't knwo what bind does.
no, bind does not have the ability to randomly drop packets
bind does not have that ability
